summary.name: navigationMenuTriggerStyle
summary.description: A class-variance-authority (cva) helper that returns a composed className string for navigation menu triggers. Separated into its own module so the NavigationMenu component file only exports React components and avoids react-refresh warnings about non-component exports.

notes: Single-purpose styling helper. Low duplication risk but similar styling helpers exist across UI primitives (consider centralizing common patterns if needed).
No runtime logic beyond class composition.
